description.value: Code system of concepts that identify the other environmental factors associated with the specimen in a specific container, e.g., atmospheric exposure. Used in the Interaction Specimen Container Detail (SAC) segment in HL7 Version 2.x messaging.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0377 (Other Environmental Factors)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Opened container, atmosphere and duration unspecified

definition.value: Opened container, atmosphere and duration unspecified

display.value: Opened container, indoor atmosphere, 60 minutes duration

definition.value: Opened container, indoor atmosphere, 60 minutes duration
